performances.description: DP 8 Acoustic Heaven

performances.venue: Alpine Valley Music Theatre East Troy, WI
performances.description: Jerry literally Screams I wish I was a headlight. He is just having so much a fun. A definitive rider
An acoustic masterpiece.  Holy headyness to say the least!!
The Other One-> Spanish Jam-> I Know You Rider.  The Spanish Jam has China Cat teases.  Really interesting 2nd set here!

performances.venue: Fillmore East (Late Show) New York, NY
performances.description: Another great acoustic version from 1970.  Alot of heady stuff from these shows.
Playing -> I Know You Rider. Jerry SCREAMS "wish I was a headlight" and blows Phil's mind
fun early version from the 30 trips box set
Very rare Rider with no China Cat.  Half Step-> I know You rider great treat.
High-energy playin' from the boys. Great Garcia solos and Phil bombs.

performances.venue: Laguna Seca Recreation Area Monterey, CA
performances.description: Crazy Fingers-> I know you Rider
Early Jammer Jitterbug Style.

performances.venue: Iowa Fieldhouse - University of Iowa Iowa City, IA
performances.description: Sounds like the old days, an excellent rider from a great show

performances.venue: Golden State Studios San Francisco, CA
performances.description: Listen the slammin rythym on this early gem
Moody, pensive, and beautifully acoustic. Like no other. Unbelievably beautiful.
garcia plays with intensity with this one and the band is right there with him
Excellent stand-alone version, Jerry plays and sings a perfect tempo. Beautiful version, ethereal to say the least.
Full of energy. From Dick's Picks 36
Nice early version, very primitive, alternate lyrics.
good old one. possibly the first.

performances.venue: Silva Hall, Hult Center Eugene, OR
performances.description: Double Headlight!!!!  I can't believe this isn't mentioned yet.. Move over Bobby here comes Jerry!!!
Another piece of awesome slightly obscured by being a 1970 audience recording.
Effortlessly smooth, incredible experimentation. may not be the best, but damn near it!
Heartful, clear and concise lyrics and just a very full sounding version and Phil is on point throughout. This whole show is hot.
Get's the introduction of "This is a famous old folk song"  Early version of a tune they would make classic. Great historical performance.
awesome early version with alternate lyrics
From Go to Nassau. It floats, while sounding like a carnival freight train. Band's on fire

performances.venue: Activity Center - University of Colorado Boulder, CO
performances.description: Incendiary version.  Soaring licks and Phil bombs.  Bobby cheeses the vocals but his playing on the final run sends this one over the top!
Still in its infancy, but listen to Jerry swarming all over it like ten thousand honey bees. Lightning fast, almost a "let's do this for 50 years".

performances.venue: Old Renaissance Faire Grounds Veneta, OR
performances.description: It’s Veneta

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: Perfect Wish I was a Headlight

performances.venue: Family Dog at the Great Highway San Francisco, CA
performances.description: beautiful
A sensational late arrival Jerry is at his magical best and is full of smiles in this beautiful version.  An overlooked gem.

performances.venue: The Matrix Club San Francisco, CA
performances.description: Deep roots with alt. lyrics

performances.venue: Madison Square Garden New York, NY
performances.description: most powerful "wish i was a headlight"

performances.venue: Pauley Pavilion, UCLA Los Angeles, CA
performances.description: Fancy fretwork and pickin' on this standalone....clear and concise in the mix! Fine early '80s example.
Amphetamine fueled stand alone rocking early version of what would become a dead staple.

performances.venue: Blossom Music Center Cuyahoga Falls, OH
performances.description: Just a peppy sparkling version...Jerry weaves it all together at the end!!
Long, slow, version to open the show. Very cool.
Tight, driving version, with excellent, teasing intro
An outstanding stand alonne Rider. Energetic, country goodness here.
Really cool jam at the beginning has a real cool cowboy feel here, then they kick in the psychedelics

performances.venue: Santa Cruz County Fairgrounds Watsonville, CA
performances.description: Garcia screams the last Headlight verse & Phil is huge on this as well
Country Fried Rider!
IMO the definitive stand-alone Rider. Blistering!!!!
Smokin' , speedy version!
